T02D2852:194a-1: a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva ra kharsa pa na s'a dha nam /
T02D2852:194a-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kharsa p'a ni'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2852:194a-4: mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2852:194a-5: yid dang mthun pa'i phyogs gang yang rung bar ji ltar bde pa'i stan la 'dug ste /
T02D2852:194a-6: res ris la sogs pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku mdun du bzhugs par dmigs la /
T02D2852:194a-7: phyi nang gi mchod pas legs par mchod de /
T02D2852:194a-9: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D2852:194a-10: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D2852:194a-12: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni /
T02D2852:194a-13: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2852:194a-14: sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags //
T02D2852:194a-15: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D2852:194a-16: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D2852:194a-17: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bya'o //
T02D2852:194a-18: de'i 'og tu rang gi snying gar yi ge aa
T02D2852:194a-19: las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer dang
T02D2852:194a-20: bcas pa de'i steng du yi ge hr'i: 'od zer
T02D2852:194a-21: 'phro ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs de dag gis chos
T02D2852:194a-22: thams cad drangs nas 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams hr'i:de
T02D2852:194a-23: nyid kyi nang du zhugs pa dang /
T02D2852:194a-24: thal mo lan gsum brdabs la tshig 'di lan gsum brjod do //
T02D2852:194a-25: aom sva bh'a ba shuddh'a:sarbba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddhonya\ham /
T02D2852:194a-26: de'i 'og tu chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2852:194a-27: tshig gi don dang bcas par bsams nas /
T02D2852:194a-28: zla ba bye ba dang mnyam pa'i 'od zer yongs
T02D2852:194a-29: su gyur pa las ral ba'i cod pan gyi dbus
T02D2852:194a-30: na gnas pa'i rgyal ba'i sku 'dzin pa /
T02D2852:194a-31: rin po che'i phug gi nang na padma chen po
T02D2852:194a-32: dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing zla ba'i 'od
T02D2852:194a-33: dang ldan pa / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2852:194a-34: zhabs g-yon pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung la g-yas pa cung zad brkyang ba //
T02D2852:194b-0: @194b phyag g-yon pa na padma dkar po bsnams pa /
T02D2852:194b-1: g-yas kyis mchog sbyin pa zhi ba'o //
T02D2852:194b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas logs na bcom ldan 'das
T02D2852:194b-3: ma sgrol ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa autpa
T02D2852:194b-4: la'i snying po kha 'byed par bsam mo //
T02D2852:194b-5: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su khro gnyer can cod pan 'chang ba /
T02D2852:194b-7: g-yon gnyis na dbyug pa dang /
T02D2852:194b-8: spyi blugs bsnams pa g-yas gnyis kyis phyag byed pa dang /
T02D2852:194b-10: spyi gtsug las skyes pa'i mchod rten gyis brgyan pa dang /
T02D2852:194b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon na khro bo chen po rta mgrin phyag g-yas pa phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02D2852:194b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas na nor bzangs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs pa de ltar bsam mo //
T02D2852:194b-14: sangs rgyas sprin ni 'phro ba yis //
T02D2852:194b-18: bsgoms pas dub par gyur na /
T02D2852:194b-19: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D2852:194b-20: du sngags mu tig gi phreng ba dang 'dra ba
T02D2852:194b-22: bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D2852:194b-24: brgya 'am stong du bzlas par bya ste /
T02D2852:194b-25: bcom ldan 'das la bdag nyid kyis mchod pa legs par bya'o //
T02D2852:194b-26: aom khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzod //
T02D2852:194b-27: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D2852:194b-28: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
T02D2852:194b-29: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2852:194b-30: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gshegs pa dang slar byon par bskul nas bzod par gsol bar bya ste /
T02D2852:194b-31: gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas //
T02D2852:194b-32: 'dir ni nyes pa gang byas pa //
T02D2852:194b-33: gang yang lus can skyabs gyur pas //
T02D2852:194b-34: mgon po khyod ni bzod pa bzhes //
T02D2852:194b-35: gtso bo nus pa ma mchis pas //
T02D2852:194b-36: ma tshang ba dang ma rnyed pa'i //
T02D2852:194b-37: 'dir ni bya ba gang byes pa //
T02D2852:194b-38: mgon khyed de ni bzod par mdzod //
T02D2852:194b-39: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis //
T02D2852:194b-40: sangs rgyas nyid ni thob nas kyang //
T02D2852:194b-41: srid pa'i rgya mtsho brgal dka' las //
T02D2852:194b-42: 'gro ba ma lus sgrol bar shog /'phags pa spyan
T02D2852:194b-43: ras gzigs dbang phyug kharsa pa na'i sgrub thabs rdzogs
T02D2852:195a-1: po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
